contextId.information: This is background information added to tell the reader what happened to the song in the future. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
contextId.quote: which has been written in The Book of Jashar

contextId.information: This word is used here to mark a break in the main storyline. Here Samuel gives information about the war between David and the supporters of Saul. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
"Now" marks a break in the main storyline. This new section gives background information about the men who served King David. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
Here "Now" marks a break in the main storyline. This gives background information about the Gibeonites. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
